body.scriptCode: var topic = do_note.do_note_new_command_common.NoteText;var draft_content = 'This is a draft page on ai content '; GoogleDocs.createGoogleDoc.setFilename('Blog post ideas - {{OccurredAt}}'); GoogleDocs.createGoogleDoc.setBody(draft_content); GoogleDocs.createGoogleDoc.setPath('Drafts');
